00028     Category& HierarchyMaintainer::getInstance(const std::string& name) {
00029         CategoryMap::iterator i = _categoryMap.find(name);
00030         if (_categoryMap.end() == i) {
00031             Category* result;
00032             
00033             if (name == "") {
00034                 result = new Category(name, NULL, Priority::INFO);
00035                 result->setAppender(new FileAppender("_", ::dup(STDERR_FILENO)));
00036             } else {
00037                 std::string parentName;
00038                 size_t dotIndex = name.find_last_of('.');
00039                 if (name.length() <= dotIndex) {
00040                     parentName = "";
00041                 } else {
00042                     parentName = name.substr(0, dotIndex);
00043                 }
00044                 Category& parent = getInstance(parentName);
00045                 result = new Category(name, &parent, Priority::NOTSET);
00046             }     
00047             _categoryMap[name] = result; 
00048             return *result;
00049         } else {
00050             return *((*i).second);
00051         }
00052     }
00053 
00054     std::set<Category*>* HierarchyMaintainer::getCurrentCategories() const {
00055         std::set<Category*>* categories = new std::set<Category*>;
00056 
00057         for(CategoryMap::const_iterator i = _categoryMap.begin(); i != _categoryMap.end(); i++) {
00058             categories->insert((*i).second);
00059         }
00060 
00061         return categories;
00062     }
00063 }
